evidence.claim: Sunshyne LTC is compliant with HIPAA standards, indicating their focus on health information security.
The company leverages electronic data interchange (EDI) standards, including X12, as part of their operational processes for claims and transactions.
Sunshyne LTC provides integrations with EHR systems to facilitate seamless data exchange and patient management.

icp.icp_reason: No relevant evidence found on their public site for X12 or clearinghouse use cases.
